page.title: 02CUBS AND BROWNIES
page.content: There are lot's of clubs in Aslockton. Brownie's is held in the church hall and Mrs Jones runs that. It is on every Tuesday and they play games and talk about various things which are coming up and they learn various skills, like drawing and cooking and if they do well they are awarded badges. They also play games and go on treasure hunts and lots of things like that.They hold coffee mornings and fetes and they go on parade. In cubs they go on camp and they play games like cricket and rounders and they do badges like first aid,animal lovers, gardners,entertainment,hobbies and homelife. Most of the children in our school have been in cubs or brownies. When they leave, the boys join the scouts and the girls join the guides.
